definition: fast matchmaking/speed dating/(coll.) (Tw) (of a couple) to be a good match
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: We will update you our January 2010 speed dating event soon.
sentences.chinese: 我們即將公佈2010年1月份速配活動，敬請留意。

sentences.english: They appeared to be speed dating veterans and had lots of advice.
sentences.chinese: 他們看起來個個都是速配老手，給了我不少忠告。

sentences.english: Their answers were then compared with the responses of the speed daters themselves.
sentences.chinese: 然後比較了他們的回答和速配約會者自己的回答。

sentences.english: Speaking of Valentine's Day, on that day the moon will be in highly compatible Scorpio this year.
sentences.chinese: 談到情人節，在今年這一天的月亮將天蠍座速配。

sentences.english: MOST people don't need a game show to find .
sentences.chinese: 很少有人通過速配節目來尋找伴侶。

definition: Capricorn (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
to get along well/compatible/also written 和得來|和得来[he2 de5 lai2]
Aries (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/used erroneously for 白羊座
Aquarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Scorpio or Scorpius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
to receive heaven's command (of Daoist immortals etc)/ordained by heaven
Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 人馬座|人马座[Ren2 ma3 zuo4]
in time with (i.e. same rhythm)/to keep in step with/fig. to cooperate
Pisces (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
partner for dating/a date (boyfriend or girlfriend)
